metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4478 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in the xmlrpc_char_encode function in modules/transport/xmlrpc/xmlrpclib.c in Atheme before 7.2.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via vectors related to XMLRPC response encoding.

criterions.comment: atheme-services: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
